languages.text: Акция устрашения возымела эффект: кем бы ни был недоброжелатель, он перестал распускать слухи. Но знать еще долго будет обсуждать жестокость Вольного Торговца.
The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.
languages.original_text: Акция устрашения возымела эффект: кем бы ни был недоброжелатель, он перестал распускать слухи. Но знать еще долго будет обсуждать жестокость Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.
The terror tactic turned out to be effective: whoever the malcontent was, they go into hiding and stop causing problems.
The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.
The terror tactic turned out to be effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have gone into hiding and have ceased causing problems.

The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.

languages.text: La mesure dissuasive porte ses fruits : qui qu'il soit, le contestataire cesse aussitôt de propager des rumeurs. En revanche, la brutalité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} n'a pas fini de faire jaser parmi les nobles maisons.
languages.original_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.

traits.locale_text: La mesure dissuasive porte ses fruits : qui qu'il soit, le contestataire cesse aussitôt de propager des rumeurs. En revanche, la brutalité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} n'a pas fini de faire jaser parmi les nobles maisons.

languages.text: 抑止効果はあった。不満分子が誰であれ、噂を広めるのを止めたのだ。しかし、貴族たちはまだしばらくの間、自由開拓者の蛮行について語り続けるだろう。
languages.original_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.

traits.locale_text: 抑止効果はあった。不満分子が誰であれ、噂を広めるのを止めたのだ。しかし、貴族たちはまだしばらくの間、自由開拓者の蛮行について語り続けるだろう。

languages.text: 威慑的手段非常有效，虽然不知道究竟是哪些人心怀不满，但所有人都停止了传播谣言的行为。不过，行商浪人的暴行与恶名，恐怕会在贵族之中流传一段时间。
languages.original_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.

traits.locale_text: 威慑的手段非常有效，虽然不知道究竟是哪些人心怀不满，但所有人都停止了传播谣言的行为。不过，行商浪人的暴行与恶名，恐怕会在贵族之中流传一段时间。

languages.text: El acto disuasorio ha funcionado. Sea quien fuera el alborotador, ha dejado de propagar rumores. Sin embargo, la nobleza seguirá hablando de la brutalidad de su Comerciante Independiente durante un tiempo.
languages.original_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.

traits.locale_text: El acto disuasorio ha funcionado. Sea quien fuera el alborotador, ha dejado de propagar rumores. Sin embargo, la nobleza seguirá hablando de la brutalidad de su Comerciante Independiente durante un tiempo.

languages.text: Die Abschreckung hat gewirkt: Wer auch immer der Stinkstiefel war, er verbreitet keine Gerüchte mehr. Die Adligen aber werden noch eine ganze Weile von der Brutalität {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sprechen.
languages.original_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.

traits.locale_text: Die Abschreckung hat gewirkt: Wer auch immer der Stinkstiefel war, er verbreitet keine Gerüchte mehr. Die Adligen aber werden noch eine ganze Weile von der Brutalität {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sprechen.

languages.text: Verilen gözdağı işe yaradı: Mızmızlanan kişi her kimse, söylenti yaymayı bırakıyor. Ancak soylular, Hür Tacir'in gaddarlığını bir süre daha dillerinden düşürmeyecek.
languages.original_text: The act of deterrence was effective: whoever the malcontent was, they have stopped spreading rumours. The nobles, however, will not stop discussing the Rogue Trader's brutality for a while yet.
